text:
RADIO STATION KUSD
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
VERMILLION
May 25, 1956
TO : NAEE Acceptance Lufccommittee
B»fe Underwood, Network Manager
John Regnell, WILL
Hugh Mix, WNAD
Waldo Abbott,WTJOM
FROM: JIM SLACK
SUBJECT : "The Ugly Scar11 We should be honored to carry this
group of lectures by Mr. Carter* Stations can dub in own
introduction if they like. Vote Yes.
0 "San Francisco Earthquakes" Am I way behind on this
one? Found the show highly interesting although Mr. Edwards
talks with too many Australian marbles in his mouth. Believe
we should accpet this one(if we havn't already) but that all
stations should be advised of its limitations...i.e. April l8th
date. Yes
"King David Cantata" Alternately impressed and un¬
certain here. Enough evidence, however, to justify our accept¬
ing work for Network usage. Yes
"Sounds in Your Ears" I think this delightful. If the
program I heard is representative of the entire series, we have
a little gem. Yes
"Variations On A Theme (Theatre)" Ben Iden Payne
is a charming storyteller. He is, as he admits, sometimes
desultory. Nonetheless, the thoughts and memories of this
excellent man of the theatre are rich listening in my opinion.
Yes.
received
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
may 3 i 1955
P M
t
